DOC.brief_title: Comparison Staples Versus Prolene Suture Skin Closure Cesarean Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: Patients meet inclusion criterion approach upon admission Labor Delivery . A study staff member describe study offer participation . If patient agrees participate , sign research protocol HIPAA consent form receive copy form . The patient 's chart flag , indicate study participant . The patient 's prenatal care labor delivery manage physician per standard care physician 's discretion , include routine surgical preparation procedure . When participate patient schedule cesarean section , randomize Arm 1 ( Staples ) Arm 2 ( Prolene ) Arm 3 ( Monocryl Vicryl absorbable suture ) . She treat per standard care cesarean section perform per physician discretion . After closure fascial layer , surgeon follow protocol study participant , include wound irrigation warm sterile saline reapproximation subcutaneous layer great 2.0 cm depth ( per standard care ) . The patient Arm 1 skin closure staple . The patient Arm 2 skin closure 2-0 Prolene subcuticular fashion . The patient Arm 3 skin closure monocryl vicryl standard fashion . Patients Arms 1 2 closure material remove physician 's discretion per standard care post-operative day 3 4 . Pain level assess first third fourth day surgery six week .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman undergo primary repeat cesarean section Maternal age great equal 18 year age Gestational age great equal 34 week Elective nonelective cesarean section Type 1 Type 2 diabetes BMI great 35 Preoperative diagnosis chorioamnionitis History drug alcohol abuse Contraindication NSAIDs Chronic pain diagnosis Narcotic use prior pregnancy Maternal age less 18 year age General anesthesia Chorioamnionitis , clinical suspicion chorioamnionitis , risk factor chorioamnionitis ( membrane rupture great 18 hour , GBS positive status ) Vertical skin incision
